plot outline: Osho movie throws light on various topics like life, love, relationship, human values, food chain, corruption, 100 percent voting and social issues like poverty, illiteracy, violence against women, Crime, drugs. Osho is a suspense thriller with many twists and turns which holds one the edge of his seat.
title: Osho
plot: _Osho_ (qv) movie throws light on various topics like life, love, relationship, human values, food chain, corruption, 100 percent voting and social issues like poverty, illiteracy, violence against women, Crime, drugs. _Osho_ (qv) is a suspense thriller with many twists and turns which holds one the edge of his seat.
